title: Retailaer, Air Europa Expand Access in Six Markets
content:
Retailaer and Air Europa are expanding the Travel Agency Portal to six new European markets — Belgium, France, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, and the UK — building on the existing Spanish launch. The portal gives travel agents access to Air Europa flights, ancillaries, and third-party services through a unified NDC-powered interface.

This expansion marks a major milestone in our partnership with Air Europa. Scaling from one market to seven demonstrates that modern airline retailing isn't just a concept — it's operational, repeatable infrastructure. The same platform, the same agent experience, now across Europe.

Read Original Article →

author: Ashley Raiteri
